attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please mr brown i am a 54 year old male  made redundant in april 2008, i am a highly skilled ex BT engineer and i cannot seem to get a job, i have applied for 100s of jobs and i am feeling i have been shoved on the scrap heap, can you help me please?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
